name: City Runners
background: The Gangs of New Eden are various factions of violent and deranged outlaws that wage eternal gang wars on the streets of New Eden. These gangs are joined by mercenaries which are not bound to any particular gang, and which fight for anyone that can provide riches or a worthy cause.

gains.name: Master Sniper Rifle
gains.label: Master Sniper Rifle (30", A2, AP(1), Reliable)

options.label: Master Sniper Rifle (30", A2, AP(1), Reliable)

sections.label: Take one Master Heavy Rifle attachment

options.label: Heavy Pistol (12", A1, AP(1)), Hand Weapon (A2)
Twin Heavy Pistol (12", A2, AP(1)), Knife (A1)

gains.name: Heavy Flamer
gains.label: Heavy Flamer (12", A1, AP(1), Blast(3), Reliable)

spells.name: Cyber-City Connection
spells.effect: Pick up to two friendly units within 12", which get Runner Boost once (next time the effect would apply).

parameters.name: effectDuration
parameters.value: once (next time the effect would apply)

costFormula.value: { name: params.effect.unitRule.name, rating: params.effect.unitRule.rating, multiplier: params.multiplier * (params.aura ? this.AuraSize : 1), avgUnit: !params.thisUnit }

effectDuration.name: once (next time the effect would apply)

spells.name: Energy Storm
spells.effect: Pick one enemy unit within 12", which takes 2 hits with AP(1) and Crack. Roll as many dice as hits to see if "on rolls of 6" effects trigger.

parameters.name: spellHitRoll
parameters.value: Roll as many dice as hits to see if "on rolls of 6" effects trigger.

spellHitRoll.name: Roll as many dice as hits to see if "on rolls of 6" effects trigger.

spells.name: Running Shock
spells.effect: Pick up to four enemy units within 18", which friendly units gets Thrust against once (next time the effect would apply).

parameters.name: effectDuration
parameters.value: once (next time the effect would apply)

effectDuration.name: once (next time the effect would apply)

spells.name: Static Blast
spells.effect: Pick up to two enemy units within 18", which take 1 hit with Blast(3) each.

spells.name: Resonance Wave
spells.effect: Pick up to six friendly units within 12", which get Regeneration once (next time the effect would apply).

parameters.name: effectDuration
parameters.value: once (next time the effect would apply)

costFormula.value: { name: params.effect.unitRule.name, rating: params.effect.unitRule.rating, multiplier: params.multiplier * (params.aura ? this.AuraSize : 1), avgUnit: !params.thisUnit }

effectDuration.name: once (next time the effect would apply)

spells.name: Electric Bolt
spells.effect: Pick up to three enemy units within 6", which take 1 hit with AP(2) and Deadly(3) each.

specialRules.name: Melee Shrouding Aura
specialRules.description: This model and up to 3 friendly units picked before the start of the game get Melee Shrouding. If this model is killed, picked models that are deployed lose the rule.

specialRules.name: Piercing Tag
specialRules.description: Once per game, during this model's activation, pick one enemy unit within 36" and in line of sight of it, and place X markers on it. When attacking, friendly units may remove markers from their target before rolling to block to get +AP(Y), where Y is the number of removed markers.

specialRules.name: Repel Ambushers
specialRules.description: Enemy units using Ambush must be set up over 12" away from this model's unit.

specialRules.name: Runner
specialRules.description: Moves +2" when using Advance, and +2 when using Rush/Charge.

specialRules.name: Ambush Aura
specialRules.description: This model and up to 3 friendly units picked before the start of the game get Ambush. If this model is killed, picked models that are deployed lose the rule.

specialRules.name: Runner Boost Aura
specialRules.description: This model and up to 3 friendly units picked before the start of the game get Runner Boost. If this model is killed, picked models that are deployed lose the rule.

specialRules.name: Quick Shot Aura
specialRules.description: This model and up to 3 friendly units picked before the start of the game get Quick Shot. If this model is killed, picked models that are deployed lose the rule.

specialRules.name: Hit & Run Fighter Aura
specialRules.description: This model and up to 3 friendly units picked before the start of the game get Hit & Run Fighter. If this model is killed, picked models that are deployed lose the rule.

specialRules.name: Surge
specialRules.description: On unmodified results of 6 to hit, this weapon deals 1 extra hits (only the original hit counts as a 6 for special rules).

specialRules.name: Crack
specialRules.description: On unmodified results of 6 to hit, those hits get AP(+2).

specialRules.name: Thrust Mark
specialRules.description: Once per activation, before attacking, pick up to 4 enemy units within 18", which friendly units gets Thrust in melee against once (next time the effect would apply).

specialRules.name: Melee Shrouding
specialRules.description: Enemies get -3" movement when trying to charge units where all models have this rule.

specialRules.name: AP
specialRules.description: Targets get -X to Defense rolls when blocking hits.

specialRules.name: Ambush
specialRules.description: May be set aside before deployment. At the start of any round after the first, may be deployed anywhere over 9 away from enemy units. Players alternate in placing Ambush units, starting with the player that activates next. Units that deploy via Ambush cant seize or contest objectives on the round they deploy.

specialRules.name: Runner Boost
specialRules.description: If this model has Runner, it moves +4" on Advance and +4" on Rush/Charge from Runner (instead of only +2" and +2").

specialRules.name: Quick
specialRules.description: Moves +2" when using Advance, and +2 when using Rush/Charge.

specialRules.name: Quick Shot
specialRules.description: This model may shoot after using Rush actions.

specialRules.name: Hit & Run
specialRules.description: Once per round, units where all models have this rule may move by up to 3" after shooting or being in melee.

specialRules.name: Hit & Run Fighter
specialRules.description: Once per round, units where all models have this rule may move by up to 3" after being in melee.

specialRules.name: Thrust
specialRules.description: When charging, gets +1 to hit rolls and AP(+1) in melee.

specialRules.name: Blast
specialRules.description: Ignores cover, and after resolving other special rules, each hit is multiplied by X, where X is up to as many hits as enemy models in the target unit and within 3 of it. Hits must be split evenly between all enemy units within 3 of any model from the target (defender picks how).

specialRules.name: Regeneration
specialRules.description: When a unit where all models have this rule takes wounds, roll one die for each. On a 5+ it is ignored.

specialRules.name: Deadly
specialRules.description: Assign each wound to one model, and multiply it by X. Hits from Deadly must be resolved first, and these wounds dont carry over to other models if the original target is killed.
